column1: |产品名称|产品型号|功能描述|
|H9MO-LMXE+.V2 Integrated Access Multiplexer|H9MO-LMXE+.V2|提供多种功能，适用于不同的网络，满足客户需求。基于 MSTP 架构，集成了 SDH 传输和 PCM 业务。支持多种传输模式和服务，广泛应用于电力、石油、交通等行业，以及市政 NM 和水资源监测。支持传输监控、远程控制和报警数据信号，并在传输网络上提供调度电话和行政电话服务。|

column2: Group to tributary, tributary to group, group to group, tributary to tributary, internal 64 kbit/s timeslot cross-connection of PCM cards
SNCP for VC-12, VC-3, and VC-4 services (Protection switching is implemented within 50 ms)  Linear 1+1 MSP, two-fiber unidirectional MSP at the STM-1 and STM-4 levels
Two power cards work in 1+1 backup mode.

External DCN  DCC NM channel: select any group from D1-D3, D4-D6, D7-D9, and D10-D12  E1 NM channel: assigned to any VC-12 of the cross-connection card or STM card, or E1 port on the E1 interface card.  EoE in-band NM channel  N*64 kbit/s in-band monitoring  Monitoring channels of PCM cards (Sa in-band monitoring)
Support 1+1 protection between any two E1 and 56 pairs protection can be configured at most
